_header: Lenten ought we to love in lede / and worship it…
_description: Gospel for the First Sunday in Lent, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
LEnte we ouhte loue in ledeAnd honouren hit in word and
                    dede…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…But Crist tok hym to his seruyseAnd cristende hym on þis
                    wyse
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
LEntine vs aght to loue in ledeAnd worschipe it in worde &
                    dede…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Bot criste toke him to his seruyseAnd cristned him apon
                    þis wyse

Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
LEntene vs owe to luf in ledeffor it es tyme of oure soule
                    mede…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And excites þemon sere wyseTo falle ageyne in þeire
                    folyse

CULDd11.First Lines:
LEnten we auhten louen in ledeand honoure it in word &
                    dede…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…but crist tok him to his seruiseAnd cristenid him on þis
                    wise
CULDd11.Note:
Break between 1862 and following 62 is 4 lines earlier in this MS, so ends ‘he
                    procurith hem in al wise / to make hem turne to his seruise’.
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica prima quadragesime Euangelium secundum mathium. Ductus est
                        ihesus in desertum a spiritu vt temptaretur &c. (f.
                    89v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Lenten aght we to loue in ledeAnd wyschype (sic) it in worde
                    & dede…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Bot criste toke hym to hys seruiseAnd cristen hym on hys
                    kynewysse
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
Dominica prima quadragesime secundum lucam (and one line Latin
                    scripture — f. 61v)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Lenten aght we to loue in ledeAnd worchip it in worde and
                    dede…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Bot cryst tuke hym to his seruysAnd crystond hym on his lyue
                    wyse

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Lenten awe we to lufe in dedeand werchipe ytt with worde &
                    dede…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…bot crist toke hym one þis ken wyse& cristyned hym
                    tyll Seruyse

HunHM129.First Lines:
Lentyn we aw to loue in ledeAnd wirschop hyt with worde &
                    dede…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Bot crist tok hym to his seruysAnd cristynnyd hym on þys
                    maner wys
